attributes.additional_details:
Today I read in the Manchester evening news that Simon Thomason, 40, who has cerebral palsy, autism and a mental age of seven, has been told his annual pass to the Trafford Centre-based attraction will not be renewed.
But after seven months of weekly visits Simon was told he was no longer welcome due to ‘child protection’. If this isn't discrimintaion, then I don't know what is.
People improve their quality of life partaking in various leisure activities and this mans has been ceased for unnecessary reasoning.
I am appalled!
Therefore this petition is to raise awareness of this injustice and to put a stop to it.
